long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blindness Test is a free online tool that allows users to test their vision and determine whether they are experiencing any degree of blindness. By taking a series of simple tests, users can quickly and easily identify any issues with their vision and take action to address them.

Our website offers various tests, each designed to evaluate a specific aspect of vision. These tests include visual acuity, color vision, and peripheral vision tests. Each test is easy to use and takes only a few minutes to complete, making it a convenient option for anyone who wants to monitor their eye health.

In addition to providing testing services, Blindness Test offers educational resources on eye health and vision care. Our website includes articles and guides on maintaining healthy eyes, preventing vision problems, and choosing the right eyewear.
